動物用藥品名稱: 默之爾雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎活毒混合疫苗(LASOTA株-麻州型)
製造廠名稱: LOHMANN ANIMAL HEALTH INTERNATIONAL (MAINE BIOLOGICAL LABORATORIES DIVISION)
效能(適應症): 預防新城雞瘟及傳染性支氣管炎。
ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE AAF......1.2 MLBRONCHITIS AAF.............1.2 MLSTABILIZER.................1.5 MLSTERILE BUFFERED SALINE....0.14 ML
